scripts.dev: cmd "/k call "$INIT_CWD/.venv/Scripts/activate.bat" && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000" || sh "$INIT_CWD/.venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.build: echo 'Python build â€“ nothing to do'
scripts.postinstall: python -m venv "$INIT_CWD/.venv" && (cmd "/k call ./.venv/Scripts/activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt" || sh ".venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt")
